div.p:
The Supporting Information is available free of charge on the ACS Publications website at DOI: 10.1021/acscentsci.8b00788.
Square overlap between the full-CI/cc-pVDZ wave function of the ground state and two-configurational wave functions using diradical characters computed from DFT in H 2; diradical characters of ethane, ethylene, and acetylene calculated at UHF; and square overlap of the initial guess and CAS-CI wave functions in phenylene-1,4-dinitrene ( PDF)
